nodes.title: Exclude pentaho-aggdesigner-algorithm to fix the build
Added `hive-hooks` component for generic path and table location modification.
Various changes to get build working on Java 11 (and a BeeJU upgrade)
Relocate Kafka classes in apiary-extensions Kafka metastore listener
fixing bug in privilege grantor lambda
adding qualified name as message attribute for filtering
Upgrade solr jar version to match what Ranger 2.0.0 plugin expects
Base files for users contributing via Github
Removing env context from listener event
Add support for Ranger audit-only mode on readonly HMS
Adding db_name and table_name to HMS SNS message attributes
Updating readme files to reflect Apiary-extensions-terraform
Terraform scripts for deploying Privileges Grantor
Event consumers: Added support in the privilege grantor when tables are renamed.
Add apiary-receivers common and sqs modules
Added architecture pic of the listener and potential consumers
Allow filtering of SNS messages on eventType
Add message attributes to enable filtering
Add location & Table Params info to events
Removed transitive dependency on org.apache.hbase hbase-client
Adding Partition Keys to Listener Output
Fixing JSON Response from Apiary Hive Metastore Listener
Adding some unit tests for additional events
Create SNS client via default method
Initial project skeleton and metastore listener
